# Welcome!

I'm Andrea Ruglioni, a PhD student in Quantitative Finance at the Swiss Finance Institute, EPFL.
My research interests lie at the intersection of artifical intelligence, optimization, and finance.
I'm passionate about developing novel methodologies to tackle complex problems in quantitative finance and beyond.

Get in touch by [sending me an email](mailto:andrea.ruglioni@epfl.ch) {{< fa feather-pointed >}}

:::
